name: PSBA
description:
PlayStation Brand Ambassador is a simple and fun to use e-learning app for UK and Irish retailers which brings the entire world of PlayStation straight to their fingertips. It equips you with everything you need to transform into a PlayStation Brand Ambassador and bring the Future of Gaming to your customers.

Features:
• Training Area – Earn points by testing your PlayStation knowledge through the extensive catalogue of quizzes.
• Store – Redeem your hard earned points in the store, filled to the brim with PlayStation goodies.
• PlayStation Latest News – Stay up to date with all the latest PlayStation news including retail specific updates.
• User Profile – Keep track of your training progress, points score and upload your own personalised avatar.
